text:
Hi! New here? (Makes spinning sounds)
Don't be shy! Let me introduce us. That man located in the South-West is Nap.
He`s from Manchester and his dream is to conquer Europe. Man on the South-East is Jiba.
(Makes spinning sounds) He`s from chinatown, San Francisco. 
He was trying to build a wall on the road. (Makes spinning sounds). 
 I ... Guess who am I?
Yeah boy! Now tell us who are YOU?

answers.text: Man who made 17 Karel worlds in 2 hours
Doesn`t matter. I want to leave this place

text:
Don`t be so aggressive. Your german accent ... 
really scares me!(Makes creaky spinning sounds)

answers.text: Well bro ... seems I need your help. Help me escape!

text: Hm do you have a plan? (Makes curious spinning sound)

answers.text: Actually, no ... Maybe I`ll dig a tunnel ?

text:
(Makes classic spinning sound) That`s simple and good idea.
I even like it. (Makes digging spinning sound). But this room is not suitable. What are you going to do with dirt? You need a room with toilet ...

answers.text: I need a reason and I think urinary incontinence is one!

text:
You are really smart boy!!! (Makes enthusiastic spinning sound)
 We can proof that. You see  compass is not really walking thing. (Makes classic spinning sound). We all are compass (Chorus spinning sound).
Bring us food and bring back dishes and we will help you.
